issue.title: If there's multiple layers in SHOP's map, only the first is added in the basket
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

If there's multiple layers in SHOP's map, only the first is added in the basket.
But all of them are visible in the perimeter popup
And all of them are visible in "recap" views

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Now all non vectors layers are copied in the minimap.
Rev. 9088
